name: Magmortar
author: nagimiso
flavor_text: From its arm, it launches fireballs hotter than 3,500 degrees Fahrenheit. Its arm starts to melt when it fires a whole barrage.

abilities.name: Incandescent Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Fire Blaster
attacks.effect: You may discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.
